where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF \ dimensional_size . name <> 'angular'

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PHYSICAL_UNIT_DATUM' IN TYPEOF ( SELF \ shape_aspect_relationship . relating_shape_aspect ) ) AND ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PHYSICAL_UNIT_DATUM' IN TYPEOF ( SELF \ shape_aspect_relationship . related_shape_aspect ) )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . name = SELF \ shape_aspect_relationship . name

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . description = SELF \ shape_aspect_relationship . description

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect_relationship . relating_shape_aspect :<>: SELF \ shape_aspect_relationship . related_shape_aspect

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( SELF ) - ( TYPEOF ( SELF \ shape_aspect || SELF \ shape_aspect_relationship || SELF \ datum_difference ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'REPRESENTATION.ITEMS' ) | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( prd2 <* QUERY ( prd <* USEDIN ( r , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.USED_REPRESENTATION' ) | ( ( ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION' ) IN TYPEOF ( prd ) ) AND ( ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) IN TYPEOF ( prd \ property_definition_representation . definition ) ) ) ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'DATUM_DIFFERENCE' IN TYPEOF ( prd2 \ property_definition_representation . definition \ property_definition . definition ) ) ) ) = 1 ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( SELF ) - TYPEOF ( SELF \ physical_unit_datum || SELF \ edge_segment_vertex ) ) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | pd \ property_definition . description = 'shape element characterization' ) ) = 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . of_shape \ property_definition . definition . frame_of_reference \ application_context_element . name IN [ 'physical design occurrence' , 'physical design usage' ]

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . name = 'single datum'

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF \ property_definition . description IN [ 'separate requirement' , 'simultaneous requirement' ]

where.label: WR2
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ property_definition . description = 'separate requirement' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_WITH_SPECIFIED_DATUM_SYSTEM' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) AND ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'group geometric tolerance' ) ) ) >= 1 )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ property_definition . description = 'simultaneous requirement' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) | ( ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PHYSICAL_UNIT_GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) AND ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'group geometric tolerance' ) ) ) ) >= 2 )

where.label: WR4
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ property_definition . description = 'separate requirement' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) | ( ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'LINEAR_PROFILE_TOLERANCE' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) AND ( pdr . related_property_definition \ property_definition . name = 'linear profile refinement' ) AND ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'group geometric tolerance' ) ) ) ) = 0 )

where.label: WR5
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ property_definition . description = 'separate requirement' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) | ( ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SURFACE_PROFILE_TOLERANCE' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) AND ( pdr . related_property_definition \ property_definition . name = 'surface profile refinement' ) AND ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'group geometric tolerance' ) ) ) ) = 0 )

where.label: WR6
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ property_definition . description = 'separate requirement' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) | ( ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'POSITION_TOLERANCE' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) AND ( pdr . related_property_definition \ property_definition . name = 'feature relating position' ) AND ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'group geometric tolerance' ) ) ) ) = 0 )

where.label: WR7
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ property_definition . description = 'separate requirement' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) | ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'group geometric tolerance' ) AND ( SIZEOF ( [ 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'LINEAR_PROFILE_TOLERANCE' , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SURFACE_PROFILE_TOLERANCE' , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'POSITION_TOLERANCE' ] * TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) > 0 ) ) ) = 0 )

where.label: wr1
where.expression: SELF \ dimensional_size . name IN [ 'angular' , 'linear' ]

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . description IN [ 'axis' , 'plane' , 'point' , '' ]

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . product_definitional = False

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . name IN [ 'single datum' , 'common datum' , '' ]

where.label: WR4
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . name = 'common datum' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'datum feature usage in datum system' ) AND ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'DATUM_SYSTEM' IN TYPEOF ( SAR ) ) ) ) >= 1 )

where.label: WR5
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . name = 'common datum' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'datum feature usage in common datum' ) AND ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'DATUM_SYSTEM' IN TYPEOF ( SAR ) ) ) ) >= 2 )

where.label: WR6
where.expression: ( NOT ( ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'axis' ) AND ( SELF \ shape_aspect . name IN [ 'common datum' , 'single datum' ] ) ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | NOT ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'reference axis' ) AND ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'DATUM_REFERENCE_FRAME' IN TYPEOF ( SAR ) ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR7
where.expression: ( NOT ( ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'plane' ) AND ( SELF \ shape_aspect . name IN [ 'common datum' , 'single datum' ] ) ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | NOT ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'reference plane' ) AND ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'DATUM_REFERENCE_FRAME' IN TYPEOF ( SAR ) ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR8
where.expression: ( NOT ( ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'point' ) AND ( SELF \ shape_aspect . name IN [ 'common datum' , 'single datum' ] ) ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | NOT ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'reference origin' ) AND ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'DATUM_REFERENCE_FRAME' IN TYPEOF ( SAR ) ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR9
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . name = 'single datum' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'datum usage in datum system' ) AND ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'DATUM_SYSTEM' IN TYPEOF ( SAR ) ) ) ) >= 1 )

where.label: WR10
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . name = 'single datum' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'datum feature usage in single datum' ) AND ( TRUE ) ) ) <= 1 )

where.label: WR11
where.expression: NOT ( ( SELF \ shape_aspect . name IN [ '' ] ) AND ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description IN [ '' ] ) )

where.label: WR12
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'plane' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | pd \ property_definition . description = 'datum direction property' ) ) <= 2 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.' + 'DEFINITION' ) | ( pd \ property_definition . description = 'datum feature identification' ) ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name IN [ 'datum feature usage in common datum' , 'datum feature usage in single datum' ] ) ) >= 1 )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'datum feature usage in single datum' ) ) <= 1 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'datum target usage' ) ) >= 1 )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'constituent' ) ) = 0 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF \ geometric_tolerance . name = SELF \ property_definition . name

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SELF \ geometric_tolerance . toleranced_shape_aspect = SELF \ property_definition . definition

where.label: WR3
where.expression: ( NOT ( SIZEOF ( [ 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_WITH_SPECIFIED_DATUM_SYSTEM' , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'LINEAR_PROFILE_TOLERANCE' , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SURFACE_PROFILE_TOLERANCE' , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'POSITION_TOLERANCE' ] * TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) = 0 ) ) OR ( SELF \ geometric_tolerance . name IN [ 'circularity' , 'cylindricity' , 'flatness' , 'straightness' ] )

where.label: WR4
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ geometric_tolerance . name = 'circularity' ) ) OR ( NOT ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'MODIFIED_GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) )

where.label: WR5
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ geometric_tolerance . name = 'cylindricity' ) ) OR ( NOT ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'MODIFIED_GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) )

where.label: WR6
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ geometric_tolerance . name = 'flatness' ) ) OR ( NOT ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'MODIFIED_GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) )

where.label: WR7
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pugt <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'group geometric tolerance' ) | pugt . relating_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'simultaneous requirement' ) ) <= 1 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . description IN [ 'dimension related positional boundary' , 'profile related positional boundary' ]

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . product_definitional = False

where.label: WR3
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'dimension related positional boundary' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'POSITIONAL_BOUNDARY_MEMBER' IN TYPEOF ( sar . related_shape_aspect ) ) AND ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'boundary member' ) ) ) >= 1 )

where.label: WR4
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'dimension related positional boundary' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | ( sar . related_shape_aspect . product_definitional = True ) AND ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'constrained feature' ) ) ) + SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PART_TEMPLATE_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF ( sar . related_shape_aspect ) ) AND ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'constrained feature' ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR5
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'dimension related positional boundary' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | ( pd \ property_definition . description = 'dimension related positional boundary property' ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR6
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'profile related positional boundary' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | ( pd \ property_definition . description = 'profile related positional boundary property' ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR7
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'profile related positional boundary' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'POSITIONAL_BOUNDARY_MEMBER' IN TYPEOF ( sar . related_shape_aspect ) ) AND ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'positional boundary and profile boundary member' ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . product_definitional = False

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | ( pd \ property_definition . description = 'positional boundary member property' ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'boundary member' ) AND ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'POSITIONAL_BOUNDARY' IN TYPEOF ( sar . relating_shape_aspect ) ) AND ( sar . relating_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'dimension related positional boundary' ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'DIMENSIONAL_SIZE' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) AND ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'substitutable dimension' ) ) ) <= 1 ) ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'REQUIREMENTS_PROPERTY' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) AND ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'dimensional tolerance statistical control requirement' ) ) ) <= 1 ) ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: ( NOT ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'DIMENSIONAL_SIZE' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) AND ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'substitutable dimension' ) ) ) <= 1 ) ) ) <= 1 ) ) OR ( NOT ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'DIMENSIONAL_SIZE' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) AND ( NOT ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'STATISTICAL_DIMENSIONAL_SIZE' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) ) AND ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'substitutable dimension' ) ) ) <= 1 ) ) ) <= 1 ) )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( gtr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PHYSICAL_UNIT_GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE' IN TYPEOF ( gtr . relating_geometric_tolerance ) ) AND ( gtr \ geometric_tolerance_relationship . name = 'substitutable geometric tolerance' ) ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_PROPERTY_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'REQUIREMENTS_PROPERTY' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . related_property_definition ) ) AND ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'geometric tolerance statistical control requirement' ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( gtr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE' ) | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'STATISTICAL_GEOMETRIC_TOLERANCE' IN TYPEOF ( gtr . relating_geometric_tolerance ) ) AND ( gtr \ geometric_tolerance_relationship . name = 'substitutable geometric tolerance' ) ) ) <= 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'conical' ) ) OR ( NOT ( ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'TOLERANCE_ZONE_EXPLICIT_OPPOSING_BOUNDARY_SET' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) OR ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'TOLERANCE_ZONE_IMPLICIT_OPPOSING_BOUNDARY_SET' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) ) )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'circular or cylindrical or spherical' ) ) OR ( NOT ( ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'TOLERANCE_ZONE_EXPLICIT_OPPOSING_BOUNDARY_SET' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) OR ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'TOLERANCE_ZONE_IMPLICIT_OPPOSING_BOUNDARY_SET' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) ) )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . product_definitional = False

where.label: WR4
where.expression: NOT ( ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'TOLERANCE_ZONE_EXPLICIT_OPPOSING_BOUNDARY_SET' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) AND ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'TOLERANCE_ZONE_IMPLICIT_OPPOSING_BOUNDARY_SET' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) )

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | ( pd \ property_definition . description = 'boundary zone definition with specified size' ) OR ( pd \ property_definition . description = 'conical tolerance zone boundary' ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'TOLERANCE_ZONE_DEFINITION.BOUNDARIES' ) ) = 1

where.label: wr1
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'affected plane'

where.label: wr2
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.' + 'DEFINITION' ) | ( pd \ property_definition . description = 'viewing plane property' ) ) ) ) = 1

where.label: wr3
where.expression: NOT SELF \ shape_aspect . product_definitional
